revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=WPL-05G300 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin=B009KZ3ABW |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=01/19/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=Powerline Access Point, access point, wireless router |fcc_id=FDI-09102110-0 |ic_id=6102A-037 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.1 |pwr_conn=C7 |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9341 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand=Atheros |cpu2_model=AR7400 |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6406EM2I-12G |fla1_num= |fla2=4 |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS5162GFR-S6C |ram1_num= |ram2=16 |ram2_brand=EtronTech |ram2_model=EM639165TS-6G |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9341 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8032 |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |flags=HomePlug AV |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=BUFFALO-XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^BUFFALO-[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.11.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''PowerLine AirStation Wireless Ethernet Adapter''' :''Powerlink 500AV Wireless-N Router'' :[http://www.buffalo-technology.com/en/urunler/kablosuz-ag-ueruenleri/powerline/router-and-adapter/archive/wpl-05g300-powerline-airstation-54/ Product page]
"2976398202" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
Default settings (including the SSID) are per the FCC manual. :The default SSID pattern is indicated to be '''BUFFALO-XXXXXX''', where '''XXXXXX''' :is the last 6 digits of the unit's MAC / BSSID (upper case hex digits?). :Encryption is indicated to be enabled by default (except in the Asia Pacific). :The default SSID in bridge mode seems to be 192.168.11.100.
